segments.text: My attention is drawn to the children on the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, almost about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's clearly going for the "COOKIE JAR" I can see inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, arm outstretched, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together on this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't give way beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on the cookies, completely unaware of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite charming to see their synchronized effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sneaky pair they are, getting those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll have quite the story if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
